XII.ii.2.D.2.b
.
Information to Include in the Award Letter
In the award letter,
identify the SSA district office as shown on the
SSA Form 101
,
SSA Form 101C
, or
SSA Form 101U3
, and
include any enclosures SSA furnished with
SSA Form 101
,
SSA Form 101C
, or
SSA Form 101U3
if it is indicated that these would have been sent to the claimant if they had been in an insured status under old-age and survivor’s insurance.
title: M21-1, Part XII, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section D - Authorization and Notification for the Special Allowance Under 38 U.S.C. 1312(a)
citation: Part XII, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section D
